tool_description: Schedules consultation appointments and manages meeting logistics for portrait photography client discussions.

client_id.description: Unique client identifier for the consultation

consultation_datetime.description: Scheduled consultation date and time in ISO 8601 format

meeting_type.description: Type of consultation: phone, video_call, in_person

estimated_duration_minutes.description: Expected consultation length in minutes (15 to 120)

meeting_location.description: Location for in-person meetings or video platform for virtual meetings

error_messages: Client not found: The specified client_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid consultation time: The datetime must be in the future and during business hours.
Invalid meeting type: Use one of [phone, video_call, in_person].
Invalid duration: Consultation duration must be between 15 and 120 minutes.
Time slot unavailable: The requested time is already booked or unavailable.
Missing location: Location is required for in_person meeting type.
usage: Provide client_id, consultation_datetime, and meeting_type to schedule a consultation. Set estimated_duration_minutes and meeting_location as needed for the consultation format.

consultation_id.description: Unique identifier for the scheduled consultation

confirmation_status.description: Booking confirmation status: confirmed, pending, or failed

calendar_event_created.description: Whether calendar event was successfully created

reminder_scheduled.description: Whether automatic reminders were set up
